title: Introduction to wisedome Banket of sapience. Preceptes of Agapetus.
author: Vives, Juan Luis, 1492-1540.
publisher: In Fletestrete in the hous of Tho. Berthelet,
notes: A translation of: Vives, Juan Luis. Introductio ad sapeintiam. Also reprints "The Bankette of sapience," translated by Sir Thomas Elyot (STC 7630), and "The Preceptes teachyng a prynce his duetie," translated by T. Paynell (STC 193).
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
